title: ci: prek + GitHub Actions gate
description:
## Objective
Add a minimal formatting/lint gate using prek + GitHub Actions.

## Must-Haves (≤3)
- [ ] Add .pre-commit-config.yaml with a small set of safe hooks (whitespace, EOF, etc).
- [ ] Add .github/workflows/prek.yml to run `uvx prek run --all-files` on push + PR.
- [ ] Ensure `.env` is gitignored.

## Non-Goals
- Large lint/test setup (eslint/prettier/etc).
- Complex workflows.

## Constraints
- Keep it fast.

## Verification
- uvx prek run --all-files
acceptance_criteria:
- [ ] .pre-commit-config.yaml exists and `uvx prek run --all-files` passes
- [ ] .github/workflows/prek.yml runs `uvx prek run --all-files` on push/PR
- [ ] CI is green on PR

title: docs: README quickstart + dev notes
description:
## Objective
Add a README with quickstart instructions and brief dev notes for the todo app.

## Must-Haves (≤3)
- [ ] Add README.md with quickstart (how to run locally) and feature list.
- [ ] Include a short "Development" section with suggested workflow (branch -> PR).
- [ ] Keep it copy/paste friendly and minimal.

## Non-Goals
- Detailed product docs.
- Screenshots, badges, or long marketing copy.

## Constraints
- Must not include any secrets/tokens.

## Verification
- cat README.md
acceptance_criteria:
- [ ] README.md exists with quickstart and feature list
- [ ] README documents local dev server command and usage
- [ ] No secrets/tokens included

title: app: vanilla JS todo list (single-user, no backend)
description:
## Objective
Build a tiny single-user TODO web app (no backend, no DB) that runs as static files.

## Must-Haves (≤3)
- [ ] Add a minimal UI to create, toggle-complete, and delete todos.
- [ ] Persist todos in browser localStorage (load on startup, save on change).
- [ ] Keep it dependency-free (plain HTML/CSS/JS, no build step).

## Non-Goals
- Frameworks (React/Vue/etc), bundlers, or backend servers.
- Multi-user, auth, syncing, or database.
- Fancy animations.

## Constraints
- Vanilla JS only.
- Everything should work via: python3 -m http.server

## Verification
- python3 -m http.server 8000 &
- curl -fsS http://127.0.0.1:8000/ | head
acceptance_criteria:
- [ ] Opening the page shows an empty state and an input to add todos
- [ ] Add/toggle/delete work and persist across reload via localStorage
- [ ] No external dependencies are required to run
